info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 24 at 3:28AM EST until February 25 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Litchfield County, Connecticut. * WHEN...From this evening through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Maximum snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible, mainly late tonight into early Friday morning. Snow will change to sleet early Friday morning, with a brief period of freezing rain possible Friday morning. Mixed precipitation may change back to snow Friday afternoon before ending.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
